summary: STEERING SYSTEM IS DEFECTIVE...TOO HARD TO TURN.  THIS HAS CAUSED THE FINGERS AND THUMBS TO BECOME DEFORMED (TWISTED AND BENT) FROM TURNING THE STIFF WHEEL.  I ALSO HAVE A NECK PAIN WHICH LEADS TO A PAIN SHOOTING UP THE BACK SIDE OF MY NECK AND CAUSING A HEADACHE.  THESE PROBLEMS STARTED AFTER I PURCHASED MY 2001 IMPALA.    *NLM
